questions.question: What space mission is NASA preparing for that involves sending astronauts around the moon?
questions.source_headline: NASA rolls out Artemis II craft ahead of crewed lunar orbit
questions.explanation: NASA is preparing the Artemis II mission, which will send astronauts on a lunar orbit

questions.question: True or False: More than 9,000 people have died from flu this season.
questions.source_headline: WATCH: More than 9,000 deaths from flu, pediatric cases nearly double during flu season
questions.explanation: The headline states that more than 9,000 deaths have occurred from flu this season

questions.question: Which African country's leader has won a seventh term in office?
questions.source_headline: Uganda's Museveni wins 7th term, opponent calls results 'fake'
questions.explanation: Uganda's President Museveni has won his seventh term in office

questions.question: What percentage tariff does Trump plan to impose on NATO members regarding Greenland?
questions.source_headline: Trump: NATO members to face tariffs increasing to 25% until a Greenland purchase deal is struck
questions.explanation: Trump announced tariffs increasing to 25% on NATO members until a Greenland deal is made

questions.question: True or False: People in Greenland have protested against Trump's plan to take control of their territory.
questions.source_headline: Thousands protest in Nuuk against Trump's plan to annex Greenland
questions.explanation: Thousands of people protested in Nuuk, Greenland against Trump's annexation plan

questions.question: Which country claimed third place in the recent AFCON tournament?
questions.source_headline: Nigeria beat Egypt on penalties to claim AFCON bronze medal
questions.explanation: Nigeria beat Egypt on penalties to win the bronze medal (third place) at AFCON

questions.question: True or False: Iran's supreme leader has admitted that thousands of people were killed during recent protests.
questions.source_headline: Iran supreme leader acknowledges thousands killed during recent protests
questions.explanation: Iran's supreme leader has acknowledged that thousands were killed during recent protests

questions.question: What dangerous internet challenge are police warning people about?
questions.source_headline: Police warn of 'door kicking challenge' that can turn viral prank 'from funny to fatal'
questions.explanation: Police are warning about the 'door kicking challenge' that can be dangerous

questions.question: True or False: The EU and Mercosur have signed a major trade deal.
questions.source_headline: EU and Mercosur sign major trade deal in Asuncion
questions.explanation: The EU and Mercosur have signed a major trade deal in Asuncion

questions.question: What natural disaster has isolated communities in New Zealand's Northland region?
questions.source_headline: Flooding in Northland isolates communities, prompts warnings
questions.explanation: Flooding in New Zealand's Northland region has isolated communities and prompted warnings
